metadata.dc:author: Servide, María José
Prieto, Mikel
Marquina, Teresa
metadata.dc:description: We present a clinical case of a 83 years old man, who consulted to the Emergency Department by continuous pain in right upper quadrant, having been discharged a week ago after ERCP for choledocholithiasis. TAC was performed showing a subcapsular hematoma without active bleeding. This complication post ERCP has been described on few occasions.
metadata.dc:title: Hepatic subcapsular hematoma: a rare late complication after ERCP.
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de enfermedades digestivas : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Patologia Digestiva
